    • Uses of Request in ddf.catalog.content.operation

      Classes in ddf.catalog.content.operation with type parameters of type Request 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  StorageResponse<T extends Request>
      Base response interface for storage operations.
      Subinterfaces of Request in ddf.catalog.content.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CreateStorageRequest
      Request to store content that is accessible by querying Metacards
      interface  DeleteStorageRequest
      Request to remove content associated with a Metacard
      interface  ReadStorageRequest
      Request to retrieve a file product associated with a Metacard
      interface  StorageRequest
      Base request interface for storage operations.
      interface  UpdateStorageRequest
      Request to update the file associated with a Metacard

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      A request to delete Metacards from the CatalogProvider

      The SourceInfoRequest represents a request to obtain Source information.

    • Uses of Request in ddf.catalog.operation.impl

      Classes in ddf.catalog.operation.impl with type parameters of type Request 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ResponseImpl<T extends Request>
      The ResponseImpl class provides a generic means of providing a Response on operations.
      Classes in ddf.catalog.operation.impl that implement Request 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CreateRequestImpl
      CreateRequestImpl represents a CreateRequest and supports passing a Map of properties for create operations.
      class  DeleteRequestImpl
      The DeleteRequestImpl class is used to delete a single or list of the String id or URI.
      class  QueryRequestImpl 
      class  ResourceRequestById 
      class  ResourceRequestByProductUri 
      class  SourceInfoRequestEnterprise
      The SourceInfoRequestEnterprise should be used to obtain Source information about each Source in the enterprise.
      class  SourceInfoRequestLocal
      The SourceInfoRequestLocal should be used to obtain local Source information.
      class  SourceInfoRequestSources
      The SourceInfoRequestSources should be used to obtain Source information about specific sources identified by id.
      class  UpdateRequestImpl
      The UpdateRequestImpl reprensents the default implementation of UpdateRequest.
      Fields in ddf.catalog.operation.impl declared as Request 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected T ResponseImpl.request 

    • Uses of Request in ddf.catalog.util.impl

      Methods in ddf.catalog.util.impl with parameters of type Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean Requests.isEnterprise(Request req)
      Returns true if this request will be run on a remote catalog.
      static boolean Requests.isLocal(Request req)
      Returns true if this request will be run on the local catalog.
